properties.name: spring.ai.openai.api-key
properties.description: API key for the OpenAI service used by the Spring AI integration; keep this value secret.

properties.name: spring.ai.openai.chat.options.model
properties.description: Identifier of the OpenAI model to use for chat requests (e.g., gpt-4, gpt-4o, gpt-3.5-turbo).

properties.name: spring.ai.openai.chat.options.temperature
properties.description: Sampling temperature for model responses; a numeric value (typically 0.0â€“1.0) controlling randomness.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used to sign and verify JWT tokens; must be stored securely and not exposed.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: Duration or timestamp after which JWT tokens expire (e.g., '3600s', '1h', or an ISO-8601 duration).

properties.name: jwt.issuer
properties.description: Issuer claim to include in generated JWT tokens identifying the issuing authority or service.

properties.name: jwt.audience
properties.description: Audience claim for JWT tokens specifying the intended recipients or services.

properties.name: file.upload-dir
properties.description: Filesystem directory path where uploaded files should be stored; must be writable by the application.
